thread.title: BRIEF-Synaptics Reports Q2 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.42

title: BRIEF-Synaptics Reports Q2 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.42
text:
February 7, 2018 / 10:00 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Synaptics Reports Q2 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.42 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Synaptics Inc: * SYNAPTICS REPORTS RESULTS FOR SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 * Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.11 * Q2 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $2.42 * Q2 REVENUE FELL 7 PERCENT TO $430.4 MILLION * SEES Q3 2018 REVENUE $380 MILLION TO $420 MILLION 
* ‍GAAP NET LOSS FOR Q2 OF FISCAL 2018 WAS $82.4 MILLION, WHICH REFLECTS A $54 MILLION DISCRETE TAX CHARGE AS A RESULT OF TAX REFORM IN Q2​ 
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.08, REVENUE VIEW $430.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
